name: Idle Laundry 3D
description:
Ready to be rich?

Become a laundry company manager and build an empire.

You start with a washing room then build dry room, ironing room, dry-cleaning room etc. Buy new machines and improve them, you can also improve the room by buying furniture and goods.

To grow your company and to become the richest, you should develop a marketing strategy. This will attract more people to your laundry.

Features:
- Casual and easy gameplay
- Amazing animations and 3D graphics
- Make important managing decisions to grow your business
